medical_history.chief_complaint: Decreased hearing in both ears since childhood.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in childhood with decreased hearing, accompanied by poor developmental motor skills, delayed speech, and language development.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with hypothyroidism; prenatal history includes maternal miscarriage and drug consumption; postnatal history includes neonatal jaundice requiring a five-day NICU stay.
medical_history.family_history: Family history is positive for hearing loss; there is third-degree consanguinity.
